title: Opportunity Owner Validations
overview:
A self-adaptive #Trigger is used to enforce owner policies on Opportunity:
- Renewal records must be owned by the Account Owner.
- High-value opportunities (≥ $500,000) must be owned by a Sales Manager (Owner.Profile).
```
ERROR("Renewal opportunities must be owned by the Account Owner.", RecordType.DeveloperName == "Renewal" && OwnerId != Account.OwnerId, "Opportunities ≥ $500,000 must be owned by a Sales Manager.", Owner.Profile.Name != "Sales Manager")
```
generalUseCase: Use the ERROR() function to define a validation rule for each field within a single self-adaptive #Trigger—centralized, streamlined, and bulk-safe with DSP expressions/formulas.
